mapper.select: SELECT user_id, username, tel, email, photo_url, CONCAT(LEFT(addr_code, 2), '0000') AS province_code, CONCAT(LEFT(addr_code, 4), '00') AS city_code, addr_code AS county_code, addr_detail, create_time, last_login_time FROM jinju_db.jj_user WHERE user_id = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE jinju_db.jj_user SET username = #{username}, tel = #{tel}, email = #{email}, addr_code = #{addrCode}, addr_detail = #{addrDetail}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
